name: LogiSense Corporation
overview:
LogiSense is a global provider of Billing and OSS software, services and solutions to the Telecommunications, Hosted Communications, Convergent, and Broadband Industries. To win in the connected world, SPs rely on LogiSense’ EngageIP® Billing and OSS products to Automate, Optimize, and Simplify their back-office requirements such as billing, order management, rating, provisioning, taxing, invoice presentment, and customer self-care - while staying ahead of their competitors with new service offerings, and improved operational efficiency.

Experience and expertise in voice, video, data and content services, LogiSense offers a broad portfolio of licensed and/or Billing-as-a-Service (BaaS)-based Billing and OSS products and solutions, empowers its customers with proven technology, innovative software, technical expertise and unmatched support to quickly and cost-effectively design, build, deploy, manage, and monetize their respective solutions.
